author: rbb
msg: Sub requests should never get into the http headers filter, so we remove
the check for it, and through in an ASSERT.

author: dreid
msg: BeOS BONE is much closer to Unix than R5 was and this patch allows
Apache to build and run on BONE.

author: sascha
msg: Because of this change, the need for handle_request_body() is gone,
so we remove that as well.

author: trawick
msg: Change the content-length filter to give up (i.e., not provide content-length)
if it gets a flush bucket.  A generator of streaming content needs to send down
a flush bucket (e.g., by calling ap_rflush()) if it wants to send a partial

author: trawick
msg: Axe a couple of newly-unused variables.
